p: The 3D and 2D binding models between neuraminidase and demethylcurcumin (A and B), and neuraminidase and oseltamivir carboxylate (C and D) were analyzed (Fig. 4). Key residues, H bonds, van der Waals forces, π-alkyl and alkyl groups were analytically labeled and visualized to understand further the details of neuraminidase binding to molecules. The chemical bonds corresponding to the residues are listed in Table 3.
